Text: Abu ki Jihofa ka ñwu mi de̩ kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ fʼukpo ulago line̩n oka la, kʼe̩ mʼu ko lʼago-we̩, e̩ ki dʼu tunyʼomi n.
Abe̩le̩, u fʼukpo ulago la, alu kʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka, oñ u mʼu ko lʼago-mi.
Tak o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi onukeji, kakini
Mʼukpo ulago kʼe̩ la le̩ ko, owñ chʼe-ki dʼago we̩, kʼe̩ kwane̩, kʼe̩ nyʼeti Yufretis, kʼe̩ mʼu ko maja ef e̩kpana okuta o̩mo̩.
Abe̩le̩ u le, oñ u mʼu ko maja eti Yufretis, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu mi.
Abu ki nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ wewe Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ nyʼeti Yufretis, kʼe̩ mʼukpo ulago kʼu ñwa ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ko maja o̩mo̩ ko.
Tak u le tʼeti Yufretis, oñ u mʼu du gwadufu, u mʼe̩wñ ulago le̩ ko kwʼugbo kʼu du maja te̩. E̩ la go, ukpo ulago le̩ mukpabie̩; i nyo̩ e̩wñ du n.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini:
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Abe̩le̩ oñ omi akpʼuba Juda kpai uba inaina e-Je̩rusale̩m bie̩.

Amone̩ e̩bie̩ne̩-i, ku ma ko̩ egbʼo̩la-mi, ku ma chʼagbo̩go̩ ku ma tʼe̩do̩-ma onugo ubi, ku ma le teketʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi, ku ma re̩ ma ku ma ño̩ dojikane̩ ñwu ma, ama adab ukpo ulago kʼi ma nyo̩ e̩wñ du n-i.

Todu alu kʼukpo ulago alamo̩ ago one̩, abe̩le̩ oñ omi che kʼo̩gbo̩ abunyi Israe̩l du kpʼo̩gbo̩ abunyi Juda du kʼu ma lamʼumi, Jihofa ka-i, todu kʼama ki chʼamone̩ kpai odu kpai uñwulo̩ kpai ojima ñwu mi; ma muda nyeti n.
Todule̩ o̩la kʼuwe̩ aka ñw ma de̩ kakini, Abu ku Jihofa. O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ka de̩ kakini, Aiko du ako̩ ñw omi achiwebe̩te̩ma; taku ma aka ñw e̩ kakini, Awa ma ka kʼaiko du ako̩ ñw omi achiwebe̩te̩ma n?

E̩gbale̩ uwe̩ aka ñw ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, omi akʼo̩te̩ emu danyʼe̩ne̩ du ki dodo ane̩-i efu e̩ko̩, tʼamonu ku ma gugu ede Defid, tʼamatama, tʼamakache̩, tʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m chaka.
Oñ nako ma fiʼomune̩, amata kpai amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ manyʼomune̩, Jihofa ka-i. Omi ali uma eju n, nachʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ n, nali ejumomi n, todu kʼu kpa ma bie̩.
Me̩ gbo̩, me̩ netiru; me̩ ki ke n,
Me̩ dʼojima ñw Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩,
Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ ma muda gbo̩ n,
E̩ ka ñw onu kpai iye onu kakini:
Ewo ewo o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ fʼo̩na re me̩,
Me̩ chi eju-me̩ nyʼate̩ ku me̩ go
E̩gba ku ma kʼabo kʼuwe̩ onugo ko̩ ma ku ma chʼamonuku-we̩ chʼamagboji-we̩,
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ ka ef e̩do̩-we̩ kakini,
E̩ne̩ Itio̩pia neke dʼaño̩-wñ kpailo̩ omune̩?
Omi akpʼuma tuka dab igbogbo
Ukpe̩ e-we̩ de̩,
Todule̩ omi onugo adʼeti ukpo-we̩ kwane̩ abʼuwe̩ eju ma,
U fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ li me̩,
